backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining notes, files, access control, storage mixins, and paywall management with admin and user query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking deployment script updates to affected files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend file purposes across components, hooks, crypto, and deployment docs.
frontend/deploy-logs/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the deploy-logs directory is committed.
frontend/deploy-logs/ic-latest.json: Template artifact file meant to store latest mainnet canister IDs and metadata after deployment.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_IC.md: Mainnet deployment guide detailing prerequisites, steps, and usage of the deployment script.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the frontend and loading the main script.
frontend/scripts/deploy-ic.sh: Bash script performing full IC mainnet deployment with logging, error handling, and artifact generation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, initialization states, error screens, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Unauthenticated screen prompting users to log in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/Initializat: Error screen showing initialization failures with retry support.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal for entering and saving a user's profile name with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorBann: Renders a styled error alert with title and message.
frontend/src/components/files/FileDetail: Shows file details with download, delete, and metadata editing features, including permission and error handling.
frontend/src/components/files/FilePrevie: Fetches, decrypts, and previews files while providing editing, downloading, and deletion actions.
frontend/src/components/files/FilesListP: Lists user files with status badges and selection handling, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/files/FileUpload: Handles encrypted file uploads with drag‑and‑drop support, progress tracking, and storage access checks.
frontend/src/components/layout/VaultLayo: Defines the main vault UI layout with tabs, file/note panels, paywall logic, and admin access list view switching.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteDetail: Displays and manages a single note, supporting decryption, editing, saving, deleting, and sharing.
frontend/src/components/notes/NotesListP: Shows the user's notes list and provides a dialog to create new encrypted notes if storage access is enabled.
frontend/src/components/paywall/PaywallP: Informs the user that storage access is restricted and displays plan and expiration details if available.
frontend/src/components/settings/AdminPa: Allows admins to view all paywall access states and revoke access for specific principals.
frontend/src/components/settings/Encrypt: Provides a switch to enable or disable client‑side encryption with explanatory messaging.
frontend/src/components/settings/Paywall: Shows the caller's paywall status and, if admin, provides controls to grant or revoke storage access for principals.
frontend/src/components/sharing/ShareMan: Provides a dialog UI for sharing or revoking access to notes or files by principal ID using share and revoke mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/encryption/useEncrypt: Manages per‑user encryption settings and exposes helpers to encrypt/decrypt text and file bytes based on a generated user key.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, initializes access control, and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentIdentity.ts: Returns the current Internet Identity principal, authentication status, and a logout function that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, stored delegation loading, status tracking, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, paywall data, and CRUD operations against notes and files using a safe actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely initializes a backend actor with timeout protection, caching, and access control setup based on the authenticated identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom light/dark theme with CSS variables for a secure‑vault color scheme.
frontend/src/lib/crypto/vaultCrypto.ts: Implements AES‑GCM key generation, encryption, and decryption for text and file bytes, storing per‑user keys in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/async.ts: Provides a helper to wrap a promise with a timeout using Promise.race.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Determines file extensions, preview types, MIME types, and checks browser video playback support.
frontend/src/utils/paywall.ts: Utility functions for evaluating paywall status, formatting expiration dates, and formatting storage sizes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters, supporting hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON state describing project goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
